company.name: AstroPraxis Consulting

company.mission: We help people transform the structures they are in and build the ones they need.
company.description: Women-owned, queer-led consultancy specializing in equity-centered systems transformation, AI development, ADA compliance, and inclusive design.

team.name: Amy Cozart Lundin
team.bio: Instructional designer and accessibility nerd. Amy builds inclusive learning systems and leads strategic training for organizations rethinking how people grow.

team.name: Nicole Hoffman

team.name: Rebecca Judkins
team.bio: Rebecca turns complex information into accessible, inclusive, and well-structured content. Her work bridges technical clarity and human connection.

services.name: Organizational Strategy & Facilitation
services.description: Strategic planning, decision-making frameworks, retreat design, and trauma-informed facilitation for complex teams.
services.details: We help teams work through complexity. Our facilitation practices are grounded in trauma-informed care, equity principles, and clarity-driven decision frameworks.

services.name: Equity & Access Consulting
services.description: Policy audits, inclusive design sprints, DEI systems consulting, and workshop delivery that's anti-performative and embodied.
services.details: Our equity consulting isn't a checkbox. We partner with teams to operationalize equity into policies, products, and daily practice.

services.name: Instructional Design & Learning Systems
services.description: Curriculum builds, eLearning dev, LMS strategy, and UDL-driven experiences for adult learners and staff.
services.details: From async courses to live training systems, we craft accessible, effective, and human-centered learning.

services.name: Tech, Automation & Systems Integration
services.description: We build low-code tools, streamline ops, automate workflows, and design internal systems that actually help people.
services.details: Your team shouldn't waste time fighting spreadsheets. We help you design backends that empower — not exhaust.

services.name: AI Development & Intelligent Systems
services.description: Ethical AI solutions, automation, and intelligent systems designed to enhance human capabilities and organizational efficiency.
services.details: We develop AI systems that respect privacy, promote equity, and genuinely help people work smarter. From custom machine learning models to AI-powered workflows, we ensure technology serves humanity.

services.name: Environmental Sensing & Drone Operations
services.description: FAA-certified aerial data collection, inspection, mapping, and environmental sensing. Modern, tech-enabled consulting that combines deep site-level expertise with AI-powered analysis.
services.details: From real estate to agriculture to environmental justice — our drone workflows are precise, compliant, and creative. We're modern consultants who combine hands-on field expertise with the power of AI to handle complex research and analysis.

services.name: ADA Compliance & Disability Advocacy
services.description: Audits, advisory, and strategic implementation for accessibility — from web apps to internal culture.
services.details: We approach ADA not as a ceiling — but as a floor. We help orgs build real access into their work.

services.name: Media & Narrative Strategy
services.description: Story strategy, content creation, and campaign development for mission-driven organizations.
services.details: We help organizations tell their stories with integrity and impact, creating narrative strategies that authentically connect with communities.

case_studies.title: Designing a Trauma-Informed Onboarding Flow
case_studies.description: Rethinking employee onboarding as a process of care, clarity, and consent — not coercion.
case_studies.focus: Creating onboarding processes that are safe and welcoming for people with trauma histories, disabilities, or marginalized identities.
case_studies.outcomes: Transformed onboarding from compliance-focused to care-centered, improving employee retention and psychological safety.

case_studies.title: Access-First Course Design Audit
case_studies.description: A practical approach to evaluating and enhancing course accessibility using WCAG and UDL principles.
case_studies.focus: Making learning environments accessible and inclusive for all learners, especially those who are often excluded.
case_studies.outcomes: Improved course accessibility and created more flexible learning pathways for diverse learners.

case_studies.title: Global Mobility & Equity Framework
case_studies.description: Building equitable international student support systems.
case_studies.focus: Addressing systemic barriers in international education and creating more inclusive mobility programs.
case_studies.outcomes: Developed comprehensive framework for supporting international students with attention to equity and cultural responsiveness.

case_studies.title: Environmental Harm Assessment via Drone Technology
case_studies.description: Using aerial intelligence for environmental justice documentation.
case_studies.focus: Combining drone technology with AI analysis to document environmental impacts and support community advocacy.
case_studies.outcomes: Provided data-driven evidence for environmental justice initiatives using cutting-edge aerial sensing technology.

approach.philosophy: We design systems that expect harm has happened and work to interrupt it. Our work is grounded in trauma-informed care, equity principles, and clarity-driven frameworks.
approach.commitment: We will meet you with care and possibility. Our work is anti-performative and focused on operationalizing equity into daily practice.
